name: pdf_to_images_converter
description: Convert PDF documents to optimized images for AI analysis. Returns S3 paths to pre-encoded base64 image files (one per page) that can be passed directly to analyzer tools via image_path parameter. Images are stored temporarily and auto-deleted after 1 day.

pdf_path.description: S3 URL (s3://bucket/key) or absolute file path to the PDF document to process.

max_image_size_mb.description: Maximum size limit for each generated image in megabytes. Default: 4.0

dpi.description: Resolution in dots per inch for PDF to image conversion. Default: 128

aws_profile.description: Optional AWS profile name for authentication.

result.description: JSON object with: images (array of S3 paths like s3://bucket/temp/session/page_001.b64), page_count (number of pages), session_id (unique identifier). Pass these S3 paths to analyzer tools via image_path.
